entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Algonquin Park (Brent)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:21 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -34.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 10:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -34.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 72 %
Dewpoint: -37.9°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
